item.title: By: Nick Davis

item.description:

item.title: By: Scott Wyden Kivowitz
item.dc:creator: Scott Wyden Kivowitz
item.description: As WordPress users there are endless options for social sharing features on our websites. As Genesis users, we want speed and efficiency. That's why I'm sharing these 3 awesome social sharing plugins for WordPress & Genesis users alike.
item.content:encoded: As WordPress users there are endless options for social sharing features on our websites. As Genesis users, we want speed and efficiency. That’s why I’m sharing these 3 awesome social sharing plugins for WordPress & Genesis users alike.
